main event: Two elliptical craft were observed hovering and then gaining elevation before disappearing in Danville, Virginia on August 13, 1954.
interesting points: The crafts were described as grayish white and elliptical with a dome on top., The observation lasted for 5 minutes., The objects hovered then gained altitude before vanishing., The observer was an engineer and minister, but their reliability is marked as unknown., No sound was reported during the sighting.
witness description: Civilian, engineer, and minister with unknown reliability
